rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0002
rows.name:
BLADE members basically
operate by taking on missions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0003
rows.name:
And those missions are posted
on this Quest Board.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Missions from HQ, of course,
but also ones from companies and the people of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0005
rows.name: A wide variety of missions get posted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0006
rows.name:
There are a ton of missions,
and the listings get updated frequently, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0007
rows.name:
For any BLADE member,
daily checks are essential.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0009
rows.name:
It ends up being the place that BLADE members,
who operate based on accepting missions, visit most often.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0011
rows.name:
I also make sure to check if there are missions suited to me
when I have time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Among the missions you take on,
even if some look easy at first[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0013
rows.name:
there are some you actually can't handle
with just your own strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0015
rows.name:
BLADE HQ has prepared a console
exactly for times like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01060100_MSG0016
rows.name:
That's the BLADE Scout Console,
which I'll introduce next.[ST:wait ]
